title: Laptops
body:
can Lenovo Ideapad 100 15.6" Laptop run league good ? here are the specs
15.6" HD (1366 x 768) display
Intel Core Pentium N3540 quad core processor (2MB cache, 2.16GHz - 2.66GHz)
4GB RAM
500GB HDD
1 x HDMI
1 x USB 3.0
1 x USB 2.0
DVD SuperMulti drive
SD card reader
Webcam
Bluetooth 
Wi-Fi
Windows 10

I kinda feel like this is basically a pad with a keyboard but I'm kinda low on budget so help me guys haha

replies.body:
Hey there,

That laptop will definitely have performance issues in league, even on the lowest graphics settings.

I'd recommend looking for a laptop with an onboard GPU (Nvidia/AMD).
